channel.title: Need Really Bad Help To Run My Client ! please look and help
channel.description:
I have recently been working on my [508] server firecapescapee and my compile broke for no nown reason. i follow someones tuturiol and i did it rong i deleted the rong thing and now my client wont work i give you detailes if you want to help me: 1.go on start then my computer 2.then to your left it sais view system information 3.click on that and then it has got loads of tabs then go on advanced. 4.there is a buttom at the bottom saying envirmont veriables press it. 5.if you scroll down there is a script saying PATHEXT. 6.when you see that go on edit and please please please copy and paste it and give it to me i need it to run my clients and if you think im going to hack in your computer of somet it inpossible if one of the staffs read this you probaly no what to do but help me BUT WHAT EVER YOU DO, DO NOT DELETE ANYTHING. you will have a more seriouse or the same problem as me
please post what it is to help ask me questions if you think im trying anything... im not and dont delete it casue you wont be able to run clients.
I NO THIS ISEN'T SERVER HELP BUT I NEED HELP TO RUN MY SERVER SO BASICLY IT IS.
remember it is [b][i][u]PATHEXT][/b]
THIS ONLY WORKS IF YOU ARE WINDOWS LIKE I AM i need this casue i had bye accident delted mine. thanks.

item.title: Need Really Bad Help To Run My Client ! please look and help

@firecapescapee wrote:

no what i did i tryed to get my copiler working bye following this tutrioul and i deleted the rong thing if you reed the whole thing youll see were.
i need help.
Probaly the staff have seen this problem before and will help me.
if anyone follows it they will be able to help me if they can be bothered that is.

i need help.
Probaly the staff have seen this problem before and will help me.
if anyone follows it they will be able to help me if they can be bothered that is.[/quote]When i try to run it, it says, " ‘java’ is not reconized as an internal or a external command, operable program or batch file.
